concept.title: Downloading a Grid in a Chart

conbody.p: To download a grid in a chart

ol.li: Select or display the report containing the chart with the grid you want to export OR access or display the chart from a pod on the dashboard. (For details on accessing a report, see “Viewing Reports”, on page 31.)

On the chart screen, hover the mouse over the bottom-left corner of the grid to display a pop- up with two file types for selection: CSV and PDF as shown in Figure 10-8 below.
Figure 10-8: File Type Options for Downloading Charts
